statements: SELECT * FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT route_id, delivery_date FROM delivery_routes WHERE driver_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes WHERE vehicle_id = 456 ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT route_id, vehicle_id, distance FROM delivery_routes WHERE distance > 50;
SELECT driver_id, AVG(distance) AS avg_distance FROM delivery_routes GROUP BY driver_id HAVING avg_distance > 30;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY delivery_date DESC, driver_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT route_id, delivery_date, vehicle_id FROM delivery_routes WHERE driver_id = 101 ORDER BY delivery_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT route_id, delivery_date, distance FROM delivery_routes WHERE distance BETWEEN 50 AND 200 AND driver_id = 203 ORDER BY delivery_date ASC
SELECT route_id, driver_id, distance FROM delivery_routes WHERE delivery_date >= '2023-01-01' AND delivery_date < '2023-02-01' ORDER BY driver_id ASC
SELECT MAX(distance) AS max_distance, MIN(distance) AS min_distance, AVG(distance) AS avg_distance FROM delivery_routes WHERE driver_id = 305
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT route_id, route_name, delivery_date FROM delivery_routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_id, driver_id, delivery_date FROM delivery_routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT route_id, driver_id, delivery_date FROM delivery_routes WHERE driver_id = 2;
SELECT delivery_id, customer_id, delivery_status FROM delivery_history WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM delivery_routes WHERE delivery_date = '2022-02-10';
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_status, delivery_time FROM delivery_history WHERE route_id = 3;
SELECT route_id, delivery_status FROM delivery_history WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes WHERE delivery_date >= '2022-02-15' ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT delivery_id, route_name FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT delivery_person_name, delivery_time FROM delivery_routes WHERE delivery_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, quantity, item_category FROM delivery_items WHERE delivery_id = 2 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT address_line, city, country FROM delivery_addresses WHERE delivery_id = 3 AND country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT delivery_id, route_name FROM delivery_routes ORDER BY delivery_time DESC;
SELECT delivery_person_name, item_category FROM delivery_routes JOIN delivery_items ON delivery_routes.delivery_id = delivery_items.delivery_id;
SELECT delivery_id, item_name, quantity FROM delivery_items WHERE item_category = 'electronics';
SELECT * FROM delivery_addresses WHERE country = 'USA' AND city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM delivery_routes WHERE driver_id = '1234';
SELECT task_id, task_description, start_time, end_time FROM delivery_tasks ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT route_id, total_distance FROM delivery_statistics WHERE total_distance > 100;
SELECT error_id, error_message FROM delivery_errors WHERE error_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT route_name, driver_id FROM delivery_routes WHERE driver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT route_name, delivery_date FROM delivery_routes ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT task_description, start_time, end_time FROM delivery_tasks WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01' AND end_time <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT route_id, total_distance, total_time FROM delivery_statistics WHERE total_distance > 100 AND total_time < INTERVAL '5 hours';
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM delivery_routes WHERE distance_km > 100 ORDER BY distance_km ASC;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_date, delivery_time, actual_delivery_time FROM delivery_history WHERE delay_minutes > 15;
SELECT client_name, address, contact_number FROM delivery_clients WHERE client_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY client_name;
SELECT person_name, role, phone_number FROM delivery_personnel WHERE role = 'Driver';
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes WHERE distance_km > 100 ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM delivery_routes WHERE route_name LIKE '%Express%' ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT delivery_date, COUNT(delivery_id) AS total_deliveries FROM delivery_history GROUP BY delivery_date HAVING total_deliveries > 5 ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT person_name, role, phone_number FROM delivery_personnel WHERE role = 'Driver' AND phone_number LIKE '555-%';
SELECT client_name, address, contact_number FROM delivery_clients WHERE client_name <> 'ABC Corporation' ORDER BY client_name ASC;
